## romanToInt variable

Convert a valid Roman numerals to an integer

**Signature:**

```typescript
romanToInt: (str: string) => number
```

## Example 1


```ts
romanToInt('MCM');
1900

```

## Example 2


```ts
romanToInt('I');
1
```

## Example 3


```ts
romanToInt('III');
3
```

## Example 4


```ts
romanToInt('MMMMMMMMMCMXCIX');
9999
```
